column5: Master bedroom with a private Bathroom, high ceiling, big desk, 3 tall window with a view to the pool, there is a loft in the room, a TV, a closet and also a door to outside to the pool and hot tub area . access in the house to: the kitchen(snacks and groceries to make breakfast provided), informal living room, laundry room(detergent and softener provide), pool and garage.
column8: Big Master Bedroom With Garage and Hot Tub
